website_summaries.verdict: Apple has another exceptional product on their hands that integrates well with the iPhone.
pros: Apple builds on the simplicity and fidelity of their standard EarPods with this product
Built-in support for Siri means playing practically any song is just a matter of asking
cons: The housing of the AirPods is made of inflexible plastic, so if the “one-size-fits-all” size doesn’t fit you, you’re out of luck
They’re also among the most expensive truly wireless earbuds available

customer_reviews.title: Injured by this product
customer_reviews.text: After 10 15 minutes of use my ears started burning when I got home I noticed that I had bleeding open wounds on my ears located where the airpods rest. I'm glad I wasn't more seriously injured. The pain continued for over 6 hours even after washing the area.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well with Amazon music app
customer_reviews.text: Does not work properly with amazon music. Slows down and speeds up randomly, mostly when switching apps. My other pair of wireless headphones still works fine with amazon music. So it must just be the AirPods. Works perfectly fine with Apple Music, no glitches, but I do not have the Apple Music subscription... so this is clearly a ploy by Apple to get people to solely use their music app. Pretty annoyed by it since I have the amazon music with my amazon prime subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Came brand new in the box, almost fully charged, everything perfect and sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and quality features
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He’s very happy with these and says the sound is really good. He loves that he can use “Hey Siri” and says they fit perfectly in his ears, staying while he runs around with his dog. He has zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KaseyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase !
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t write reviews but I’ve spent hours trying to resolve the issues with this order today that I want to save someone else the time . Don’t buy this product from this source . My airpods looked brand new / unopened box but turns out they were used and not reset , did not pair with any device we tried and didn’t even have correct functions after talking to apple . Not sure if it’s fake, refurbished , etc but save your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Emma G

customer_reviews.title: Not Apple Ipods
customer_reviews.text: These are not Apple air pods. They are fake. My son spent his own money and got scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: I was sent fake airpods. Compared to my real ones bought at the Apple store and they were obviously fake.
customer_reviews.author: Gasgarth

customer_reviews.title: My refund
customer_reviews.text: First, I am reviewing this based on price! It was advertised at $139. I was charged $199. The original in the post was $159 scratched out with the $139 below it. I would like my refund please! Also, K do not know how to wrk these. They fall out, hurt my ears, and only one of them work half of the time, also nothing happens when touching or tapping them. I cannot make anything happen by talking. I can get Siri to answer me after awhile of yelling at her, and that’s it. Other than that, I really don’t understand these things!
customer_reviews.author: Curious cat owner

customer_reviews.title: Saving the wife’s life
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my lovely bride who sleeps with headphones on. By the morning she is all wrapped up in cords. Now she won’t strangle herself at night
customer_reviews.author: IBuyAlot

customer_reviews.title: I would Recommend It
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly well and also just as described. It’s new also
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Adu Gyamfi

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast delivery by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: It is not same as previous version. visually it looks same but it is much faster and Siri works great if you like running and other sports activities . I would say buy this version it is more useful
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Aguinaldo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these earbuds/airpods but alas no go. The battery life was zilch. And the connection to my iphone kept dropping everytime I was a short distance away from the phone. Tech support was no help. The person kept having me do the same thing expecting difference results.. epic fail there. I am now using my husbands $5.00 dollar headphones which sucks, but at least I can listen to music. I am dissapointed in apple.
customer_reviews.author: jujutsu Joy

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: The wireless AirPods were not in the box. A white air pod box was in the box but wax empty. I also had cancelled this order as it was too long to wait for it.
customer_reviews.author: pfod

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for fakes. Ordered "brand new" and checked serial number on apple website.
customer_reviews.text: Returned the fake airpods and bought brand new airpods. There are multiple websites that will show you how to spot a fake, but still the best way is to cross check the serial number on apple's website.
customer_reviews.author: TRUYELPER

customer_reviews.title: Used and Gross
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this item. It didn’t say anything about being used or refurbished which is misleading. Product came without the proper packaging and the product itself wasn’t even cleaned (which is gross considering this was in someone else’s ears). Just buy straight from Apple and save yourself the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Trh1226

customer_reviews.title: Fake fake fake
customer_reviews.text: First time I’ve been taken on a product. These are not genuine Apple AirPods. These are knockoffs do not buy. Compared immediately with my friends Pods and the case was different, writing is different, seams in the Pods themselves that proven they are poorly made, did not connect right away, died instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Mat R.

customer_reviews.title: Great battery and noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Noticeably better than the previous generation in sound quality. The 2nd one feels to work the same, but the audio quality is noticeable. Where the 1st was very mediocre and had no bass or great mid, the 2nd is a quite a bit better at (and I think louder but not sure if my comparison 1st gen has issues). The battery life seems to match the spec and is great but time will tell since the 1st gen decreased to 50% life in a year time.
customer_reviews.author: jmn27

customer_reviews.title: Lucky me
customer_reviews.text: When I got the headphones, I thought the headphones that on the left were broken. Fortunately, I finally found that I was deaf.
customer_reviews.author: Albert jing

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend these things. Comparing to the ones I got from Costco. The only "advantage" to this one is the Price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not AirPods in box!
customer_reviews.text: These were not AirPods. The box was Apple air pods but inside were not AirPods. They were dogaye. I bought this for my daughter as a birthday present and was extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Fritzen

customer_reviews.title: Just buy directly from Apple
customer_reviews.text: Returned these because they looked like they had been used and honestly look like they were fake. Don’t know if they were a defect or if someone had swapped them out before I got them. I advise you to buy direct from Apple if you want to avoid this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Faris Ziyad

customer_reviews.title: Use them every single day
customer_reviews.text: Let’s be real they are really expensive, But they are great, does sound good. they stay in your ears I work out with them and they don’t fall off. This is my second pair I have the first generation and I bought this one after two years of uses every single day because I was having battery problems. I have my first generations ones now for use exclusively exclusively in the shower so I don’t have a panic attack if it ever falls into the water. There’s not really a difference between the first and second generation so if you already have it and they work good I wouldn’t really upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Magdaliza Negreira

customer_reviews.title: Received my brand new headphones used and dirty.
customer_reviews.text: Received item in opened manufacturer box. The headphones were dirty and definitely used because they still were called the previous owners name. They do work for now but have someone else's earwax on them.
customer_reviews.author: 88pieces

customer_reviews.title: Used ear pods.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these and received "Jakes Earpods" so it appears we received an old used pair. gross.
customer_reviews.author: azlady28

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Is it worth $200 for portability and quick wireless charging sure. Could they have improved on these AirPods tremendously? Absolutely... they really let us all down with this one size fits all crap, my ears start to hurt in about 3-4 hours I guess it’s good that the battery dies around then huh? I’m trying out the beats Solo 3 skyline edition and these have got me thinking 🤔 The beats are really good but can you beat the small compact size and awesome portability of the AirPods? I don’t think so. If portability and a small form factor isn’t on your mind then get the beats..
customer_reviews.author: Imani Qaasim

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sleek and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love my Airpods 2. It automatically connects when you put them on and the sound quality is absolutely amazing. The battery life is crazy long especially with the wirelessly charging case. The double tap feature is extremely easy to work with and if you need anything else you have Siri to help you out. Apple enthusiasts look no further, just grab your pair now because you should have already!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Apple product at Amazon price
customer_reviews.text: These AirPods are the latest model with wireless charging capabilities, making them the most convenient earbuds on the market, in my opinion. I purchased them to pair with my iPhone 8 and didn't even have to read the instructions, before the two were paired. Now when I open the case, I can see on my phone the battery status of the case as well as the AirPods. Super sleek styling, magnetic seating and closure makes these so slick to replace for charging. Now I want a cover to go around the case! Well worth the purchase, save some money buying from Amazon. My only complaint, no Apple sticker, but I've got others, so I'll be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product - Risky!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these, and expect a long time to get them (even with prime) Once I did receive them I got the wrong model not only once but TWICE If you can get these DO they're good headphones with the best battery life, most compact but maybe not with Amazon sorry.
customer_reviews.author: giovanv

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER disappointed. Got these for my teenager. Was excited because they were on lighting deal. They’re not LEGIT REAL apple pods. They advertise wireless which they are not. Legit apple products come in the apple box WITH plastic wrap sealed MINE DID NOT. I’m furious and my daughter IS heartbroken cuz NOWWWW I need to return these NOT FOR FREE on Monday when I get to work. SUPER disappointed
customer_reviews.author: JACKiE

customer_reviews.title: Just a brand name
customer_reviews.text: Out the box these don’t feel like there quality. My first pair of AirPods and I would say there worth it as long as you understand your mainly buying into a brand. But if you expect 200$ worth of wireless headphones than this wouldn’t be the right place. Be wary of these things, they give me headaches and sometimes I will notice a high pitched buzzing noise if I leave them in my ear without playing music.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase you’ll ever make. I’ll never go back to “broke pods” again haha (earphone with wires). You don’t need the noise cancelling ones. These do great job and provide great sound. The battery life lasts forever and they charge SO QUICK. On top of that, all you have to do is put them in the case for a little bit and then BOOM, they’re charged again. One thing is that the case can be hard to clean where the hinge is. Do yourself a favor and get these, you will never regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Larson

customer_reviews.title: Bought For My Wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife and she absolutely loves them. She takes them to the gym, to work out around the neighborhood on her runs, and when she's cleaning around the house. Only complaints I hear from her is that sometimes, the headphones will just randomly connect to her iPhone OR only one headphone will connect while the other stays silent. She just disconnects and reconnects them to resolve this issue; apparently it is an issue a lot of people have but work through. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ross B.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Much improved from original version. Connects faster. Not sure if it sounds any better the before.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It won’t work or pair with any iPhone in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE FAKE FAKE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give no stars I would. THESE ARE FAKE AIRPODS. I compared them to my girlfriends real AirPods bought from Costco and they are 1.) significantly larger 2.) do not have the Apple printing on the back 3.) the individual AirPods flash lights?? (Didn’t know Apple added this feature) 4.) the case snaps differently than the original, it is loose and feels cheap—unlike the real ones. In the images; the one on the left are the “airpods” I received, and on the right are the authentic ones
customer_reviews.author: T H

customer_reviews.title: You really don't need to spend more for the best.
customer_reviews.text: Surprising sound clarity. These were not designed to be noise cancelling, but in my opinion, you don't need that feature. The sound purity in the less expensive AirPods is soo good I don't notice external sound as much. However, I want to hear a little of the outside world when I'm in the world walking, jogging or bike riding incase a Mack truck is coming at me. Still these things have awesome sound quality, great connection distance, and the pods themselves can stay in your ear with some of those accessories, unless you just don't trust yourself to take care of them.
customer_reviews.author: Gornata Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great audio quality from a name you know
customer_reviews.text: One of the things I've always liked about the Apple earbuds is that they deliver pretty decent low end frequencies. A lot of the other branded earbuds didn't really seem to satisfy this request. I listen to all kinds of music - alternative, metal, rap, country, and even classical. Having earbuds that provide a fuller range are a necessity. The wired ones fit the bill there - so how well do the wireless ones hold up? Excellently. I've not really heard any degradation of audio going to the Airpods. Haven't really challenged the battery life yet as I have chargers at home, work, and in the car. I've never had them run down below 50%. Thus far, they've held up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Beach

customer_reviews.title: First Class Product
customer_reviews.text: Apple knocks it out of the park again, great upgrade over original
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Loved the AirPods 2 and a definite upgrade from previous Bluetooth earbuds. Really like that they turn on automatically and I can use just one that add the second if needed for better sound quality. Highly recommend adding the aha plastic cases which allows wireless charging without removing them. I also like that when I open the case and the phone is on and unlocked, the earbuds and charging case displays battery life.
customer_reviews.author: RMH

customer_reviews.title: Pairs Perfectly Well with iPhone 6S.
customer_reviews.text: Pairs perfectly well with an iPhone 6S. I use them with silicone in-ear hooks. Battery life is not exceptional by any means, though they are adequate enough. The only real annoyance I have issue with, is that from time to time I somehow seem to activate music playing when I least want it to play. Beyond that, they are a fairly good pair of Bluetooth earphones. I have paired them with an iPad Pro, AppleTV, and MacBook Pro without issue. However, I do have less success with an AppleWatch. . .
customer_reviews.author: WestministerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: They fall out.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s me but they fall out of my ears with any type of activity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Airpods!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, yes they are real airpods, and yes they worked great. My wife and I are both going to school and have to listen to lectures on our iPhones. These synced fine and worked exactly as expected from airpods. Got the wireless charging case as well. Check camelcamelcamel for the best price (not trying to advertise this site...but you definitely need to look up reviews on that). The price over the past year it has fluctuated quite a bit and we happend to pick them up at an alltime low price. GREAT DEAL!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is fantastic. Integrating with iPad Pro and iPhone and my MacBook Pro was quite easy. I tried jumping around and spinning, but the AirPods stayed in my ears without issue. They are quite comfortable. Can have them in all day at work and I barely notice them. My only issue, not enough to drop a star as for me it was not a big deal, is that the tapping of the AirPods to perform actions is a little difficult. I find that the touchable surface area for this is mostly covered by my ear. It takes me a few attempts to get this to work.
customer_reviews.author: JavaDragon

customer_reviews.title: Great Apple quality and sleek look
customer_reviews.text: I got these earphones for my wife for her birthday after receiving a pair myself. Great quality and sleek look. I didnt think they would stay in my ear as well as they do (as I often have issues with other earphones), but never fall out. In addition, the sound quality is surprising good. I wouldnt say its the best in the market, but its definitely up there. In addition, it is very easy to link up to your device and does not have any lag.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Much improved from 1st Gen AirPods!
customer_reviews.text: I've been an AirPods user since they first came out, and my biggest complaint was the battery life. They just didn't last very long. I found myself having to stop listening to music for a few minutes or switch to another set of headphones while they recharged. That has not been an issue with these! The battery life is much improved. Also, the Bluetooth connectivity has been improved so that switching between devices is much faster. Summary: -Longer battery life than 1st Gen AirPods -Better Bluetooth = faster device switching
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Apple does it again!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good for such small devices. The battery life on these are awesome. If you happen to run low, toss them in the charging case for five or ten minutes and you are good to go. I love that they charge so fast!! You can even charge one while you are wearing one if you don’t want to miss that streaming show you are watching. I had the original AirPods for two years with no complaints, but these seem even better battery wise and sound wise. Not to mention it is nice to have the choice of charging wirelessly or with the connector.
customer_reviews.author: Happy camper

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: got these for my daughter, she used them a couple times and the left one stopped working along with the case. I spent literally hours on the phone with apple trying to get the issue fixed. I had to give them another almost $200 for them to send me a replacement and once they got the broken ones back they would retuned my money. Apple support is not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Apple AirPods have been a game changer for work. It is so convenient which cleaning or cooking so I don’t have to blare the music to cover up the noise on a speaker. I also work an office job, so it is great being able to file, make copies and perform other duties without having to carry my phone with me or working around wired headphones. The battery life for the technology is pretty great. I do chose to alternate earbuds in order to extend the battery usage throughout the day since they will not make it for a full 8 hour shift.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney B

customer_reviews.title: No More Small Talk
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god. I would have cut my arm off to get these if I couldn’t afford them. I use these every day and listen to my audiobooks, so I don’t have to listen to my coworkers. It’s nice considering that all I hear is my amazing book when they are trying to ask my about my weekend. Definitely get these, even if your coworkers aren’t annoying and even if you don’t have an iPhone! Music, movies, books, podcasts or whatever! These are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Right bud stopped working after a week
customer_reviews.text: They are fun and useful. Using Siri is easy with voice command. The audio in the right bud became loud on the outside and quiet on the inside after about a week of use. We had already passed the return window by 3 days. Apple walked us through factory reset but it did not fix the problem. They are sending a replacement in the mail, but it is disappointing for an apple product to break so quickly. Hopefully the replacement pod will not malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Shalome

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, reliable, wonderful sound quality, siri addition to the AirPod 2s is like having a personal assistant in your head. So comfortable that I frequently forget I'm wearing them. I was on the fence about buying AirPods for the last two years. Do yourself a favor and try a friend's if you're on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good but not all they’re cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: My review in a nutshell: 1) if you already have AirPods don’t upgrade. The sound isn’t any better and the noise cancellation is only so-so at best. 2) they don’t stay in worth a crap - my son gave them back to me after a week and went back to his old AirPods 3) aftermarket memory foam tips made the falling out go away. For $250 Apple should include them with the silicone tips 4) they do work with find my iPhone app thank goodness 5) great range and good overall sound but not noticeably better than regular AirPods 6) good battery life and they charge pretty fast in the case
customer_reviews.author: mrcstv

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is not what Apple claims
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, sound quality fantastic, I especially like the control function by tapping the top of the air pods. I also like the case, you can charge that separately and then charge the air pods in the case as well. I do not like the battery capacity. Every time I start using them for a run or a walk, batteries start to die, they don’t last more than 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: These new ipods, received Wednesday, Nov 27, 2019, would not sync to my iPhone 8 +. As I am an "old guy" carried them to my IT guy, who started me on Apple products a few years back, and he could not get them to sync either. Would like to drive over to a local Apple store to see if they will exchange for me vs returning to Amazon. Do not know if Apple/Amazon will allow that but will try Monday morning, Dec 2, 2019. Once exchanged will reevaluate my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Citizen

customer_reviews.title: First gen Airpods, good if you hate wires
customer_reviews.text: First, these arrived new and connected right to my phone which was a plus. They are literally the regular headphones but without wires. If you turn music up the noise cancels but otherwise no special features. Also for some reason when I go running they fly out my ears, so wouldn’t recommend for rigorous activities.. if it could just be my ears. And they say they’re not waterproof but I dropped them in water and put them in rice & they worked soo lol. One last thing, the whole wireless charging case is just the case being charged & you can charge your airpods in that case off the charger.
customer_reviews.author: K.jenns

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box. Ripped plastic and dirt all over the bottom of the box
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged and dirty. Only complaining because I'm giving it as a gift and it looks tacky but no time to return the item and order a new one. Not sure how the item works because its not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, interfaces easily with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my college-age son and he loves it. I had previously purchased other brands for him and they did not interface well with his iPhone. No problem with that here, obviously. Also the first wireless ones he's had, which was key. He uses it every day to make phone calls and listen to music as he works out. He is very happy with the sound quality. Battery life is not an issue, he says it recharges quickly. It will be interesting to see how they hold up. For this price, I expect not to have to replace them annually. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. D.

customer_reviews.title: So happy with them! Get the warranty too!
customer_reviews.text: I took a leap of faith with purchasing these and I love them. A day after they arrived (which was about a week), I purchased the Apple Care through Apple’s official website. First they had to verify my purchase which was NOT. A hassle at all, and I bought the Apple Care for $29 which is a great deal! For just under $30 bucks for a warranty of 2 years, why not? I’m so happy with my purchase, both the AirPods and the Apple Care! (:
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

customer_reviews.title: you can just stick them on a cheap Ikea charging pad and bam like 10 mins charged
customer_reviews.text: Way better than version 1 and you can just stick them on a cheap Ikea charging pad and bam like 10 mins charged
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parrillo

customer_reviews.title: price changes
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with the product,But why did I buy it for 169? I come back the next day and the price is down to 139?
customer_reviews.author: Fade

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product for an Apple Fan
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this product. I have been using it for more than 6 months now. I use it during my exercise while running. They are perfect. The AirPods fit perfectly in the ear and sound quality is amazing. I face some disturbance when the phone is a little far away or when in pocket while running. I am also able to connect my AirPods to my windows laptop and I am being able to take meetings while cooking as well. It has certainly saved me from purchasing a Bluetooth headphone. I am not particularly a big fan of noise cancellation and this product fits my requirements perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Avijit Jain

customer_reviews.title: Anyone else having trouble with defective speakers?
customer_reviews.text: One of the speakers are deficient and I need to return them for a replacement. How do I do that
customer_reviews.author: Kandy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Listen UP (but turn it down😁)!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the freedom and easy! Can become a bit addictive that keeps me from enjoying the natural auditory life around me. Be careful. After a bit use, I found that the case didn’t charge the left as well as the right (left chronically failed first). Started charging the left alone, then the right whereby correcting what I found as a product limitation. Troubleshooting success! Enjoy the purchase as I do! Daily gym use and incorporating at different events, as applicable.
customer_reviews.author: Grady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teen. He LOVES them! The sound quality is great and being cordless is so convenient as it keeps his hands free for all the other stuff kids have to carry around at school. The cordless charging case is awesome because it charges his AirPods while he’s not using them, without having to look for a source of electricity while out and about. Cool how the case magnetically “ catches” the pods. You wouldn’t think little things like that matter but it helps get them in the case all the way without pushing them down - to be sure they charge. Solid buy! Definitely worth the price! I might even get some for myself! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: A good blue tooth earphone sets but it comes in 3 pieces, Lose one you have to replace the set!
customer_reviews.text: good bluetooth sound and fits nicely in ear. One size fits all nothing to get stuck in the ear canal you have to fish out. However it is a three piece unit - left ear, right ear, charging unit. Nothing connecting the two ear pieces so it is all too easy to lose one ear piece then the whole does not work. I'm going back to a unit that holds the plugs together as I lost one of the plugs. they're rather expensive to replace.
customer_reviews.author: James Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Secure fit, beautiful sound, EZ pairing!
customer_reviews.text: My first set of AirPods and I'm super happy! Fit is secure. Sound is crystal clear. EZ-PZ pairing with all Apple & Mac devices. Wish it didn't have such a high price tag. I've purchased other brand, cheaper AirPods for other family members, and have returned them all. The fit is not the same, nor sound quality. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dasiki

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband for Father’s Day. He uses them daily. He owns his own business and is constantly taking calls. He has had several ear pieces and he says this is by far his favorite. Noise cancellation is top notch. He has them connected at least 10 hrs a day usually more and the battery life is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: alicia seiger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Apple AirPods!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. These buds are super practical for almost every activity and have instantly replaced my Bluetooth headset for handsfree usage. The sound has the quality I expect from Apple. Running on a treadmill to simply moving around , no more wires getting tangled up and they sit comfortably. Options to use either one or both , the charging case ... they are all winning features for me. The biggest surprise has been how far I can move away from my phone and still remain connected. Wait...not done. Take them out and instant pause on music or video ... You guys get it that I think these things are Amazing?
customer_reviews.author: P. Estwick

customer_reviews.title: Simple the best!!
customer_reviews.text: This apple air-bud is the best!! I have own more than eight air-bud, trust into you used the apple air bud, u have been missing out. Once you go apple air-bud no will be no going back to any others period. As you can see in the pic, there is only one in the case because I lost one of them, and the best part with that you can still use the other one, unlike other one buds. I did purchase the air pad pro, no comparison, when it comes to clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Talthia

customer_reviews.title: Loud sub bass pop in voices and constant amplifier hiss
customer_reviews.text: I have hearing a little different than most people I guess. There is a old school transistor like hiss even when listening to nothing. The hiss is something I have not heard since most new devices have mosfet based systems. When listening to youtube videos or any video that someone talks directly into a mic the airpods produce a loud "pop" of very low frequency. Think of listening to talk radio on a 12" sub woofer. The audio is clear but not refined enough for the huge price tag. It's also a pain to get the airpods out of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Toasted

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: After having my air pods for almost a year, my husband wanted a pair of his own for work (finish carpenter). He loves them because they cancel out all the loud noises at work and the sound quality it excellent! I use mine while working out on my stationary bike and they are perfect! The charging case is great because it charges fast and prevents constantly charging into a usb. Battery life is long as well. Some complain apple products are too pricey, but you get what you pay for and these are definitely a quality product! No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Should buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I was so happy to get this. I love to listen to music 🎧 The quality is great. Don't have any trouble with these apple airpods
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Fulton

customer_reviews.title: be careful - i got unopened new ones, my roommate’s box wasn’t sealed and was empty
customer_reviews.text: extremely satisfied with this product! ordered yesterday morning and arrived this afternoon. was very skeptical as my roommate ordered the same ones and received a box without the plastic wrap and there were no airpods inside. i have read similar reviews and other reviews of people getting used airpods, but my box had plastic wrap and is brand new and, sure enough, there were also brand new airpods inside! very pleased and grateful. the sound quality is so good! would 100% recommend these but be cautious as obviously orders of this product have not gone so well for other people.
customer_reviews.author: RHunter

customer_reviews.title: These were very nice
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these. They are small and convenient. I have never been able to wear in-ear earbuds but was hopeful these would work for me. Unfortunately, they didn't fit my ears and caused my ears were in pain while wearing them. Amazon was very good about letting me return them. If you get these as a 'refurbished' just know they were only worn for a few hours and they are in perfect condition. I did not want to give them up. I wish Apple would make bone conducting because that's what I can comfortably use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: “It-just-works”, excellent quality sound, perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally sent my AirPods v1 through the washing machine and dryer. /sad. I bought a pair of Sony Bluetooth ear phones, and they were terrible. So, I bought the AirPods v2. The “it just works” between Apple products, the small size of the AirPods, the fast recharge, the amazing sound of the AirPods v2, they are the best. My AirPods swap between my apple iWatch, my iPhone, and my iPad effortlessly. If you have Apple stuff, buying the AirPods is the only way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Keys

customer_reviews.title: Air pods not working
customer_reviews.text: I just got some pods for the first time. They are brand new and I tried resetting them first I couldn’t do it so I call customer service and they helped me and it started to work but as soon as o hung up one of the pods went out and stopped working. I Didn’t even get to enjoy them within 24hours. And I always wanted a pair now that I got a pair today for the first time then I end up finding out that one of them don’t work really mad me upset and sad that I spent my money on a product that’s messing up like this Please get back with me ASAP thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Typical Apple quality and elegance
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy some ear hooks, but with them, these pods fit comfortably and securely, for running or any other vigorous activity. Sound is good. Big plus is the great compatibility with my I-phone. Got lots of ear buds; these are the best. Wish the life of the pods out of the case was a bit better, as I wear one most of the day for occasional listening to book and answering and making calls. I get about 5 hours before they need to go back into the case.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry M

customer_reviews.title: Replacements don't even work
customer_reviews.text: I am not an Apple fan but my daughter wanted these for Christmas. They worked fine for 3 months but then the left pod stopped working. Apple replaced it since it was under warranty but the replacement doesn't work either. Now neither pod will be recognized by her phone and she can't use them at all. Tried contacting Apple support but have been waiting more than a day for a response. There goes my money down the drain (again). Thanks for nothing Apple!
customer_reviews.author: KBalcerzak

customer_reviews.title: Not So Happy Kid...Anymore
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. Thus far, my son is very happy with the product itself; however, it's been only one day that he's had them. Today is Sat., 18 Jul 2020. It's been about 60 days since my son received the AirPods. While he was excited when he first got them, he's no longer excited. He's not pleased anymore. Within the past month, the left ear dies much faster than the right. Also, he's not able to hear in them as clearly as he did when he first received them. Unfortunately, we've missed the window to return them. Now, I'm forced to use the warranty. No telling what's next....
customer_reviews.author: LaJuan N. Watson

customer_reviews.title: No AirPods Received
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. Received item empty - no AirPods!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product. I’m so happy
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful product. I’m so happy I ordered these on a whim. I was really excited to get them until I read the reviews. I was worried that I would receive someone’s use AirPods with ear crust all over them and I would just be so unhappy and have to send them back. I’m so happy to say that that’s not the case. When I received my AirPods they were completely wrapped With all the necessary paperwork. These are legit. I’m so happy I took the plunge and even happier that I had a great experience. These are going to be so useful when I’m traveling
customer_reviews.author: Kanitra

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Overall exactly what I needed. I bought these before the new Pro ones came out but I’m still happy with these. I knew there were better sounding Bluetooth headphones on the market but I wanted something that would easily connect to my phone and watch. It does the job! I haven’t had any issues with them connecting to my phone, they even connect to my yoga 900 laptop but that threw them off a little to connect back to other things so I use them primarily for Apple products for ease.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: By the new ones with the rubber earbuds so they fit better in your ear so they don’t fall out.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but if you jog or move around bumping a lot they will fall out of your ears. Better to get the updated version that has the new rubber tips on them which they have three different sizes large medium and small pay a little more but a better product. Would've been the way I went. And I just bought him three months before some a little little sour about it but they are a great product. If you’re active you should definitely get the ones the new ones if you’re real mellow done don’t worry about they will stay in your ear.
customer_reviews.author: PacaCheetah

customer_reviews.title: Love the wireless charging case
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has a pair of the first generation AirPods and he loves them. I was pretty jealous so when these new ones came out with the wireless charging I had to hop on it. I am very satisfied with my purchase, and love that I can charge them wirelessly on my charging pad instead of having to find a charging cord that breaks eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I've lost my AirPods which I love. I know there is a 2nd generation with active sound isolation. But I don't really like to be totally isolated and paying extra $100 for that. I like the unique design and the sound is just good for me. They fit my ears really well. I can have it on when I work out. I did pay $20 for the wireless version because I have a wireless charging pad already. So far, it has been working fine for me. Fits my backpack and pocket too.
customer_reviews.author: allen

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Shame on Amazon for not letting buyers know that this product is NOT NEW. I ordered a pair thinking I got a deal, but in reality, I got a pair of iPods that did not work. The wireless charger would not charge. The sound quality was really poor. When I talked to Apple support, they informed me that I needed to send them back. They also recommended ... Always buy Apple products from Apple!!! I learned my lesson!! AND I hope Amazon learned their lesson by offering full disclosure of what you will receive.
customer_reviews.author: Portia H

customer_reviews.title: Better Hearing for Dummies!
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER had a lot of success with ear buds but my adult kids all wanted them for Christmas and I got curious. I’m a psychologist who does a lot of phone therapy and I decided to get some. Wow! These are the simplest things to use. You open the tiny charger case and your phone tells you how charged they are. Easy. They hang in your ears making them very comfortable. Using these has really simplified my work. I can hear SO much better without carrying my phone around. I love, love, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Julie P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! Been contemplating buying for quite some time and I should have done it sooner! They’re so easy to set up if you have iPhone or other Apple product. And the battery life is INSANE. The charging case holds charge a long time as well as the pods themselves. Was looking for something good for running. I have a pair of ‘not wireless wireless’ brookstones and they just don’t stay in my ears. These true wireless were a bit hard to adjust to without the volume adjust on a wire attaching them but I love them so much more. They stay in my ears no matter what! And I’m a sweaty human! Recommend these to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Better than the 1st Generation
customer_reviews.text: 100 times better connectivity than the 1st generation Airpods, 1000 times better in battery life. Unwanted Siri popping up and stopping the music and constantly getting triggered even when I'm not saying "Hey Siri". It also gets triggered when someone else is talking in the room or t.v is playing in the background. Other than the annoying Siri's unwanted interruptions, I like these expensive headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: I love my AirPods!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the battery life was so long, and that you can charge them with just the case. They were so much easier to use since there was no wire to untangle when I wanted to listen to music. On the downside, the right one stopped working during week 3! My Grandmother bought them so she called Amazon to return them. Problem was Amazon couldn’t help her, she had to talk to Apple. Apple was supposed to call her back but didn’t. Her second call worked, we think. I should get my new right AirPod on Monday, but my Grandmother was on the phone with Apple for 1hour 29 minutes and 52 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: kami657

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love my AirPods. I wear them on a daily basis and have held up against some pretty nasty falls. I once dropped them in a puddle and thought for sure all Hope was lost, but nope! They continue to work beautifully. The sound quality is superb and I appreciate being able to hear the world around me with them in. Not noise cancelling by any means, but that is not what I was looking for. Battery life is great with this case. I charge mine once every few days with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly convenient
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Galaxy Buds with these after being annoyed by the fit, which I found uncomfortable. My AirPods have since been incredibly comfortable to wear. AirPods have been incredibly convenient. They are easy to pair, simple to move between multiple devices (especially between various Apple devices) and have great sound quality. The battery generally gets me through a week before needing a charge on my usage, although if I have a high-use day, they may only last me two days. It would be nice if they could work better with Android phones and Windows laptops, but they are still great earbuds for these devices. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Parker G.

customer_reviews.title: I love my AirPods A LOT but....
customer_reviews.text: I love them but they hurt my right ear sometimes. They are slightly big for my right ear so it gets irritated and hurts when i put them on. The pain goes away after I give them a day off lol I know this is not their fault, just thought i would mention it for people with small ears like me. Also, their battery life is not the greatest but it’s good for 5hrs and charge super quick!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: the right airpod stopped working after my return policy was gone.
customer_reviews.text: My air pod were working great until one day i noticed that if i put the left one in first the right would not connect. I would have to put them back in their case and then put the right one in first. That was not a big deal until the right air pod stopped charging. I had the case plugged in and the air pods inside all night only to wake up with the right one being at 2% when everything else was 100. To make matters worse I am no longer allowed to return this faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it. Just be prepared to switch for the few times it goes mute.
customer_reviews.text: I like thst it's wireless however there were times when in the middle of a conversation, it would automatically go mute. And this is only after 5 minutes into the conversation over thr phone. Got nothin to do with the signal or carrier. Never happened b4 until I started using the airpods. All in all, it serves the purpose- but totally much better reception than the cheap immitations out there. Fits in my ears pretty well- better than the wired ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AIRPODS ARE AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THEM!!!! I got my Airpods this summer (during Prime day) and they are the best thing I've ever purchased. I'm actually mad at myself for not getting them sooner. I had wireless Beats, which were alright for listening to music, but they were way too bulky and didn't take calls the way Airpods do. I'm an Apple person, so I absolutely love how they switch from my phone to my Mac and iPad. If you're considering getting them - DO IT!!! They are absolutely amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasya

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: This is an apple product. It is solid and works seamlessly. Of course it is priced higher than others because it is a high-end product. You don't expect Whole Foods quality from Aldi's produce section, do you? You get what you pay for. Bite the bullet and get these wireless earbuds. They will last you a long time and connecting takes seconds. They actually drown out the background noise fairly well and battery lasts longer than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Almes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My only drawback is the battery life of the AirPods and not the case. The pods themselves seem to run battery life pretty fast but the case not so much. But charging them is pretty fast. I honestly love them, they fit perfectly in my ears and sound quality is great. But my husband doesn’t like the way they fit comfortably in his ears, maybe they could come up with some plastic covers for ppl with sensitive skin because hi ears at sensitive to them sometimes but other than that he likes them as well
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great choice of wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loving this purchase! I was skeptical because I hate the sound quality of Bluetooth headphones, but these sound better than my wired apple headphones. They also stay in my ear perfectly fine. I haven't experienced latency issues. I also use a galaxy s8+. Definitely worth the purchase if you're fed up with getting your wired headphones caught on things when your on the go. Haven't had any issues, if i ever do I'll make an edit to this review So far! Go for it if you're thinking about getting these
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a wireless Bose headset. The sound quality is good. The carry/wireless charging case is awesome and super convenient, though I don’t charge it wirelessly. The small size is perfect for carrying around anywhere. It fits in your pocket or purse, and is not too big to attach to your keys with a separate case. The noise cancellation is good, but not as good as the Bose headset I’m replacing. The buds stay in pretty well. I love that you can wear just one or both and the sound adjusts itself. I’m pretty happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Apple AirPods with Wireless Charging Case
feature_bullets: Universal fit that’s comfortable all day
Easy setup for all your Apple devices
Quick access to Siri by saying “Hey Siri”
